name: ambureview-mvp
description: Sistema de gesti√≥n de ambulancias - MVP Production Ready

scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d db mailhog && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd src/backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd src/backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd src/backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.ci:install: npm ci && cd src/frontend && npm ci && cd ../backend && npm ci
